title: Advice to a Prophet - effect of the repetition

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes an effect of the repetition of the phrase “ask us” in line 33?

choices.label: It suggests that the prophet himself is the cause of much of the world’s misery.
It represents a sarcastic challenge to the prophet to ask the right questions.
It suggests that the speaker is certain of the answer the prophet will give.
It provides a tone of imploring earnestness.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
